# The `InstructionClassification` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Custom <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instvisitor">InstVisitor</a> to classify different instructions for whether it can be analyzed for similarity. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Custom <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instvisitor">InstVisitor</a> to classify different instructions for whether it can be analyzed for similarity.
